info.abstract:
[Type] Flow control.
[Behaviour] Start anew sub-block of a selection block "if".
[Parameters] - condition : boolean expression to be checked: if true, the tasks depending on OPH_ELSEIF are executed, whereas the tasks OPH_ELSEIFs and OPH_ELSE associated with the following selection sub-blocks are skipped; if false, the tasks depending on OPH_ELSEIF are skipped, whereas the task OPH_ELSEIF or OPH_ELSE associated with the following selection sub-block is executed.
